title: Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio on Her Plans to Empower Women through Cycling
content:
Moolman-Pasio wants to make cycling more accessible for women across the world through e-racing as well as helping get more African women on bikes.

Read the full article at Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio on Her Plans to Empower Women through Cycling on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
